page.title: 15Children's Games
page.content: I have chosen to write about two {Skipping Games}called 1.{'Bumper car'} and 2.{'High Low'}.I shall show the rhymes in blue, instructions in white 1. {Bumper car,bumper car, { Number forty eight, { Went round the corner}(jump out){ { Slammed on the brakes }(jump in) { How many bumper cars did you see? { 1,2,3,4...} (the rope turns faster and faster and the person skipping keeps on counting until he or she trips at which point they are out.) 2.{High,low,medium,slow,dollies, {peppers,snakes and choice. {High}- turn the rope so that it doesn't touch the ground. {Low}- crouch down low as you skip. {Medium}- skip normally.{Slow}- turn the rope slowly.{Dollies}- crouch down low and suck your thumb as you skip.{ {Peppers}-rope is turned very quickly.
